data.lyric:
[ti:It All Comes Out in the Wash]
[ar:Miranda Lambert]
[al:It All Comes Out in the Wash]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]It All Comes Out in the Wash - Miranda Lambert
[00:04.13]Lyrics by：Miranda Lambert/Hillary Lindsey/Lori McKenna/Liz Rose
[00:08.27]Composed by：Miranda Lambert/Hillary Lindsey/Lori McKenna/Liz Rose
[00:12.41]If you wear a white shirt to a crawfish boil
[00:15.75]Stonewashed jeans while you're changing the oil
[00:18.27]When you find yourself dating the bridesmaid's ex
[00:21.43]You accidentally bring him to the wedding whoops
[00:24.14]If you pour yourself a Merlot to go
[00:27.06]You dip your fries in your ketchup on a bumpy road
[00:29.83]You spill the beans to your mama sister got knocked up
[00:32.90]In a truck at the 7-Eleven don't sweat it
[00:38.70]'Cause it'll all come out all come out in the wash
[00:44.63]It'll all come out all come out in the wash
[00:50.96]Every little stain every little heartbreak no matter how messy it got
[00:56.24]You take the sin and the men and you throw 'em all in
[00:59.30]And you put that sucker on spin
[01:13.76]You got frisky with your boss at the copy machine
[01:16.64]You drunk dialed your ex-husband don't remember a thing
[01:19.71]Had a fancy dinner at your mother-in-law's
[01:22.71]Spilled A.1. Sauce on her table cloth don't sweat it
[01:26.71]A Tide stick will get it
[01:28.61]It'll all come out all come out in the wash
[01:32.01]All come out in the wash
[01:34.42]It'll all come out all come out in the wash
[01:37.94]All come out in the wash
[01:40.71]Every little stain every little heartbreak no matter how messy it got
[01:45.91]You take the sin and the men and you throw 'em all in
[01:48.93]And then you put that sucker on spin
[01:52.43]Put that sucker on spin
[01:54.83]You gotta put that sucker on spin
[01:59.28]And the laundry list goes like this
[02:02.43]Every teardrop every white lie
[02:05.13]Every dirty cotton sheet let it line dry
[02:08.06]All the mistakes all the wild streaks
[02:10.98]That's why the good Lord made bleach
[02:14.38]Oh oh
[02:25.57]'Cause it'll all come out all come out in the wash
[02:28.93]All come out in the wash
[02:31.65]It'll all come out all come out in the wash
[02:34.77]All come out in the wash
[02:37.67]Every little stain every little heartbreak no matter how messy it got
[02:42.95]You take the sin and the men and you throw 'em all in
[02:46.10]And you put that sucker on spin
[02:49.50]Put that sucker on spin
[02:52.11]Yeah put that sucker on spin
[03:03.66]Yeah you put that sucker on spin
[03:05.34]And around and around and around and around we go
[03:11.31]'Round and around and around and around we go
data.trans:
[ti:It All Comes Out in the Wash]
[ar:Miranda Lambert]
[al:It All Comes Out in the Wash]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.13]//
[00:08.27]//
[00:12.41]如果你穿着白衬衫去吃小龙虾
[00:15.75]穿着水洗牛仔裤去换油
[00:18.27]你发现你的约会对象是伴娘的前任
[00:21.43]一不小心还把他带去参加了婚礼
[00:24.14]如果你给自己倒了一杯红酒
[00:27.06]在颠簸的路上拿薯条蘸番茄酱
[00:29.83]你说漏嘴 让你妈妈发现你妹妹怀孕了
[00:32.90]在便利店门口的一辆车里 别担心
[00:38.70]因为 真相终将大白于世
[00:44.63]真相终将大白于世
[00:50.96]每一个污点 每一次心碎
[00:56.24]你把罪恶和过去 统统清洗干净
[00:59.30]让那个懦夫付出代价
[01:13.76]你在复印机旁和你的老板打情骂俏
[01:16.64]你喝醉酒 给你的前夫打了电话 后来什么都不记得
[01:19.71]在你婆婆家里吃了一顿丰盛的晚餐
[01:22.71]把调料洒在了她家桌布上 别担心
[01:26.71]就让汰渍洗衣粉来解决问题吧
[01:28.61]真相终将大白于世
[01:32.01]真相大白
[01:34.42]真相终将大白于世
[01:37.94]真相大白
[01:40.71]每一个污点 每一次心碎
[01:45.91]你把罪恶和过去 统统清洗干净
[01:48.93]让那个懦夫付出代价
[01:52.43]让那个懦夫付出代价
[01:54.83]你必须让那个懦夫付出代价
[01:59.28]列下一个长长的清单
[02:02.43]每一滴泪水 每一个善意的谎言
[02:05.13]每一张脏掉的床单 把它们统统晾干
[02:08.06]所有的错 所有的放荡不羁
[02:10.98]上帝创造漂白剂就是为了洗净这些罪恶
[02:14.38]//
[02:25.57]因为 真相终将大白于世
[02:28.93]真相大白
[02:31.65]真相终将大白于世
[02:34.77]真相大白
[02:37.67]每一个污点 每一次心碎
[02:42.95]你把罪恶和过去 统统清洗干净
[02:46.10]让那个懦夫付出代价
[02:49.50]让那个懦夫付出代价

[03:03.66]让那个懦夫付出代价
[03:05.34]让他付出沉重的代价
